name: Hand of Midas
description: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

abilities.name: Transmute
abilities.description: Instantly kills the target non-hero unit, transmuting it into gold and experience. Sets the target's gold bounty to a fixed value, while multiplying the experience bounty.
notes: Cannot be cast on Roshan, Creep-Heroes, Ancient Creeps, and Necronomicon Warriors
Upon cast, Transmute instantly kills the target unit, dealing 100% × CurrentHP damage to kill the targeted creep
Grants the caster 160 unreliable gold and 2.1 × XPBounty experience
The target's default bounties are not granted
If targeting a Flagbearer Creep, the aura gold bounty is still granted
A newly acquired Hand of Midas starts with 1 charge
If cast on a neutral creep, also grants Madstone to the caster and random allies

additionalInfo: View the Transmute Efficiency table for Transmute gold acquired based on the target it is used on
The earlier Hand of Midas is purchased, the earlier it will pay itself off during the match
Assuming it is always used whenever a charge is ready, Hand of Midas increases GPM by 87.27
It takes 23 minutes and 50 seconds to pay its 2200 gold cost off, which is 14 casts
It takes 18 minutes and 20 seconds to pay its 1750 recipe cost off, which is 11 casts
trivia: Midas is based on Midas, a figure from Greek mythology who turned all he touched to gold
Alchemist's cosmetic item, Midas Knuckles, is based on Hand of Midas

recentChanges.description: Transmute no longer secures a neutral item token from the current tier. Now also grants a full Madstone bundle when cast on a neutral creep. A Madstone bundle contains 2 Madstones for the caster, and one for a random ally.
Increased Transmute charge replenish time from 100 to 110.
Reduced attack speed bonus from 40 to 35.
